name: All Aboard!
description:
Keen to control chaos, keep order and ensure calm?

In this train based puzzle game you are responsible for maintaining the peace and reducing the stress of passengers undertaking their daily commute.

As passengers line up to enter the train swipe them into available seats as quickly and efficiently as possible.

Delays in seating the passengers will cause ripples through the lines much like a traffic jam, and if the line is delayed for too long, the game is over; the player aims to seat as many trains worth of passengers as they can before making a mistake.
